amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-751 to address the devastating opioid crisis in tribal communities by ensuring that tribal housing authorities are designated as eligible entities to receive vouchers and ensuring that the selection criteria for awarding vouchers reflects the impact that opioids is having in tribal communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Moore.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
